intro.p: This node calculates the values of structural similarity of input fingerprints against a given template fingerprint. It also can take multiple template fingerprints and aggregate the similarity values.

fullDescription.option: The column that contains the fingerprints.
The column that contains template fingerprint(s).
Name of the new column that contains similarity values.

When there are multiple template fingerprints in the second port, it can calculate minimum, maximum, or average similarity values. If there is only one template fingerprint, this option has no effect.

ports.outPort: The same as input fingerprints, plus an extra column with similarity values
